<math alttext="question mark" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>?</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 

The enthalpy change for the reaction <math alttext="2 A l, solid, plus F e 2 O 3, solid, react to produce, 2 F e, solid, plus A l 2 O 3, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>Al</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Fe</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>Fe</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="negative 860 kilojoules per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>860</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Based on the standard enthalpies of formation <math alttext="delta H naught sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>°</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> provided in the table, what is the approximate <math alttext="delta H naught sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>°</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="F e 2 O 3, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Fe</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
